\section*{deleteSimulationDatasets}

\begin{par}
Delete simulation dataset from data/training and data/test path at once.
\end{par} \vspace{1em}

\subsection*{Contents}

\begin{itemize}
\setlength{\itemsep}{-1ex}
   \item Requirements
   \item See Also
   \item Load Path to Clean Up
   \item Delete Datasets
\end{itemize}


\subsection*{Requirements}

\begin{itemize}
\setlength{\itemsep}{-1ex}
   \item Other m-files required: removeFilesFromDir.m
   \item Subfunctions: None
   \item MAT-files required: config.mat
\end{itemize}


\subsection*{See Also}

\begin{itemize}
\setlength{\itemsep}{-1ex}
   \item \begin{verbatim}removeFilesFromDir\end{verbatim}
   \item \begin{verbatim}gernerateConfigMat\end{verbatim}
   \item \begin{verbatim}Project Structure\end{verbatim}
\end{itemize}
\begin{par}

\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{par}

\end{par} \vspace{1em}


\subsection*{Load Path to Clean Up}

\begin{par}
Load path from config.mat and where to find training and test datasets.
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Matlab-editor]
try
    clearvars;
    close all;
    load('config.mat', 'PathVariables')
    disp('Delete from ...')
    disp(PathVariables.trainingDataPath);
    disp(PathVariables.testDataPath);
catch ME
    rethrow(ME)
end
\end{lstlisting}


\subsection*{Delete Datasets}

\begin{par}
Delete datasets from training dataset path and test dataset path with certain file pattern.
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Matlab-editor]
answer = removeFilesFromDir(PathVariables.trainingDataPath, '*.mat');
fprintf('Delete training datasets: %s\n', string(answer));
answer = removeFilesFromDir(PathVariables.testDataPath, '*.mat');
fprintf('Delete test datasets: %s\n', string(answer));
\end{lstlisting}
